pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,1,1632339964,ECG Buddy,ARPI Inc,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/ecg-buddy/id1632339964?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Medical,"Hello Doctor!
Introducing your ECG companion, ECG BuddyTM.
ECG Buddy is a Class II software medical device that analyzes electrocardiograms taken with a smartphone. (Korean MFDS Approval Number: 24-1179)
It assists in diagnosing 11 types of heart rhythms and provides 10 digital biomarkers indicating the risk of emergencies and cardiac dysfunction.
Make sure to have ECG Buddy ready before your shift!
〈Usage Credits〉
・ Up to 10 credits are automatically recharged daily. (This may change once the subscription system is developed and implemented.)
〈Precautions〉
・ You must read the ""Instructions for Use"" before using this product.
・ It can only be used in countries where it is approved.
・ It is intended for use exclusively by physicians who can interpret 12-lead ECGs or by medical personnel who transmit the analysis results to such physicians to support their work.
・ It can provide diagnostically useful information but can never replace the medical judgment of a physician.
・ If you have any health-related questions, consult a professional.

・ There may be bugs as it is in the early stages of distribution. Please report any issues to support@arpi.ai, and we will address them as quickly as possible.",2024-05-20T07:00:00Z,2025-11-24T07:42:25Z

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,2,6449489557,Pregnancy Tracker | Calculator,Mohammad Aladham,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/pregnancy-tracker-calculator/id6449489557?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Medical,"The 'Pregnancy calculator – Tracker' application is designed to assist you in tracking ovulation and help to plan your pregnancy as and accurate pregnancy calculator. This fertility tracker accurately predicts fertile period dates for planned pregnancy.
Pregnancy planning:

It helps you to get pregnant in your fertile days. User need to enter the first day of period and click on calculate feature to calculate the more accurate pregnancy date. It also saws the baby possible weight and size on that week. Users will find it easier in use. It has first, second and third trimester details to give guidance for users.
Prepare baby bag:
It gives you the list of baby bag things. Like which thing is important in baby bag. All the necessary things are mentioned on the list for your ease.
Mother bag:
Let’s prepare your mother bag with this app.  It has all the details of mother bag, which are important in the hospital. If you are first time mother, then it will definitely works perfect for you.
Suggest Names:
It also suggest names for babies with their meanings.
Diet planner:
Some important articles refers in the application to guide you to prepare health plan. All the details of diet plan for pregnancy are available in this feature.
Supported Language:
Both English and Arabic languages are available for user understanding.

The Pregnancy calculator and tracker software is designed to help you through every stage of your pregnancy. The program was developed on the basis of the A7amama blog. The Pregnancy tracker and calculator provides accurate estimates for the conception and delivery dates. You can track your fetus week after week and get useful advice for both you and your child.

In addition to a wide range of baby names that have meanings for easy selection, the app provides daily, weekly and monthly updates. You can also customize your birth pack checklist to make sure you have everything you need for your pregnancy.
Pregnancy calculator and tracker is a must-have for all expectant parents. It has a wide range of features and is easy to use.
Important Features:

column2: Suggested articles of diet plan in pregnancy
Get done with baby bag list
Share the app with other social platforms

column1: pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,3,1243672846,Pregnancy App.,Amila Tech Limited,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/pregnancy-app/id1243672846?uo=4,0.0,4.875,8,Medical,"Pregnant? Just track your pregnancy week by week using Pregnancy App.

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,4,990178211,amma: Pregnancy & Baby Tracker,PERIOD TRACKER & PREGNANCY AND BABY CALENDAR LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/amma-pregnancy-baby-tracker/id990178211?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Medical,"Pregnant? Get the free app for expectant parents to track how their baby is growing

amma Pregnancy Calendar is an indispensable tool for expectant mothers! Get detailed information on the development of your baby at each week of pregnancy. Hundreds of thousands of women have already chosen to use this app, so join them, and us, on this incredible journey!
With amma Pregnancy Calendar you can easily:
- Get DAILY pregnancy info
- Track your pregnancy week-by-week over the 9 months
- Get baby size information and development updates weekly
- Get information on changes in your body flow
- Manage weight and belly growth gain goals with clinical guidelines for your BMI
- Track contractions and send results to a medic with Contraction Timer
- Pregnancy+ Weight log
- Track baby kicks with Kick Counter
- Get more information about the weekly expectations of pregnancy
- Share on Facebook, Email, Text & Twitter
- Personal Diary
and much more

Every woman who is expecting a child, is preparing herself for giving birth. Naturally, she will want to know how her baby is developing, what is happening to her body and what other changes are awaiting her until the birth. In this application, you will find a detailed weekly pregnancy calendar giving you ease of access to information about pregnancy and fetal development, changes in a pregnant woman's body, as well as tips on nutrition for pregnant women. For each week of pregnancy, there are four pieces of information:
To use the pregnancy calendar, and count your due date, simply enter the date of your last period and you should see the information about your duration of gestation

This App is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.",2015-05-31T16:12:58Z,2025-11-11T11:53:04Z

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,5,985603707,Safe Delivery,Maternity Foundation  Fondet,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/safe-delivery/id985603707?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Medical,"The Safe Delivery App – App Store Description Adaptation:
Here is the award-winning and research based Safe Delivery App, made to support the provision of high-quality and life-saving obstetric and neonatal care to women and babies everywhere.
Let us help you to help others!

This is for all midwives, healthcare professionals and birth attendants that have been longing for a convenient and accessible tool to help them to grow and maintain their maternal and neonatal clinical knowledge, competencies, and skills. This app can help you to develop confidence and the resilience needed to give life-saving care.
Why you should download The Safe Delivery App:
Fulfil your commitment to lifelong learning!

The Safe Delivery App enables flexible, self-directed learning in basic midwifery emergency care and essential clinical skills. The clinical content is evidence-based to help keep you up to date with guideline changes, encouraging the provision of high-quality, woman-centred care. You can take ownership for your learning as it helps you to track your own progress, highlighting areas that need revision.
User-friendly Design

This app is easy-to-use and contains concise clinical guidance to support quick responses to time-pressed emergency situations. The app is free and can be downloaded for use offline. This means that it can be used at any time - whether on the job, in your spare time or as part of your training.
National and Language versions available

The Safe Delivery App offers a choice of different national and language settings to make it more appropriate to the different contexts of the users. So far, the app is available in Global English, French and Arabic, as well as being adapted to 18 country versions to align with national guidelines. Our animated videos are also made to be culturally appropriate to help users to relate to the content.
Useful App Content:

column2: Culturally adapted animated videos of clinical procedures
Written clinical procedure descriptions related to maternal and newborn health
Drugs lists with protocols for medicine preparation and administration.
A variety of clinical guidance modules, including infection prevention, hypertension, normal labour and birth, postpartum haemorrhage, sepsis and much more.

column1: About the App Creators

The Safe Delivery App has been developed in a collaboration between the Maternity Foundation, the University of Copenhagen, and the University of Southern Denmark. All procedure guidance has been based on international guidelines of the World Health Organization (WHO) and the International Advanced Life Support in Obstetrics (ALSO).
Learn More
Visit our webpage at www.safedelivery.org to find all video content and exercises for each module online.",2015-04-20T19:17:13Z,2025-09-01T08:12:17Z

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,6,289560144,Pregnancy Baby Tracker - WTE,"Everyday Health, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/pregnancy-baby-tracker-wte/id289560144?uo=4,0.0,5,5,Medical,"Join the #1 Pregnancy & Baby Tracker App that’s Trusted by Millions for Week-by-Week Guidance and Baby Tracking Tools.

What to Expect is the world’s best-known baby development and growth tracker app chosen by more than 15 million parents. We’re the parenting, infant and family planning brand, offering you a free all-in-one pregnancy and baby tracker app with thousands of medically accurate articles, daily pregnancy updates, expert baby growth tracking, and personalized parenting tips to help you nurture a healthy pregnancy, a thriving baby, and confident parenting.

Find guides for every step of your growing family’s journey—from starting a family and recognizing early signs of pregnancy to navigating motherhood, newborn care, and the baby and toddler years. Find support and connection with moms, parents, and parents-to-be throughout your pregnancy journey.
During Pregnancy
* Due Date Calculator that determines your due date based on last period, IVF transfer, conception, and ultrasound, while sharing fun facts about your baby
* Week-by-week pregnancy tracker with info about baby development, symptoms and family preparation tips
* Themed baby size comparisons, visual countdown and 3D videos showing baby development in utero week by week of pregnancy
* Helpful daily tips designed to support you at every stage
* Keep track of your bump, symptoms, pregnancy weight, kick counts, birth plan and memories with our My Journal tool
* Expert-reviewed articles on signs of labor, pregnancy symptoms, baby and mom’s health and helpful tips
* Registry Builder to help you with your baby list and registry
* Detailed pregnancy and baby product reviews and expert buying guides
* Expecting Twins? Learn about different types of twins and possible fetal positions
* Use the contractions counter to track the frequency and duration of contractions
After Baby’s Arrival
* Baby Tracker that lets you time and track baby’s feedings, log pump sessions, diaper changes, tummy time, and more
* Month-by-month and milestone tracker for each step of your baby’s life, from the newborn to the toddler stage
* Daily tips tailored  to your baby’s age, stage, your postpartum recovery, and your parenting journey
* Record your postpartum symptoms and medications
* Informative videos and articles about sleep schedules, feeding tips, milestones, and baby’s growth and week-by-week development
* Medically reviewed articles and info about baby’s health, doctor’s appointments and vaccines
* Join community groups meet people with due dates in the same month, newborn care, mom’s health conditions, parenting styles and more
Family Planning
* Ovulation Calculator that pinpoints your most fertile days based on last period and cycle
* Due Date Calculator that helps you figure out baby’s potential due date when you’re trying to conceive (TTC)
* Ovulation tracker and early pregnancy signs, plus keep a journal of your feelings when you’re trying to get pregnant
* Expert advice and articles to help you understand your cycle, signs of ovulation and pregnancy, fertility issues, adoption and surrogacy, and more
* Community groups devoted to preparing for pregnancy and fertility treatments
About Us

All content on the What to Expect app is accurate, up-to-date, and reviewed by medical experts, including the What to Expect Medical Review Board. It aligns with current health guidelines and Heidi Murkoff’s trusted books
Medical information comes from expert sources like ACOG, AAP, CDC, and peer-reviewed journals to ensure reliability and credibility.
For more about What to Expect's medical review and editorial policy, visit: https://www.whattoexpect.com/medical-review/
Do not sell my info: https://dsar.whattoexpect.com/
Use our pregnancy tracker app to help nurture a happy, healthy pregnancy & baby! Let’s connect:
* Instagram: @whattoexpect
* Twitter: @WhatToExpect
* Facebook: facebook.com/whattoexpect
* Pinterest: pinterest.com/whattoexpect

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,7,1561612139,Календарь беременности,Vaiz Abdrakhmanov,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%8C-%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8/id1561612139?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Medical,"BabyInside – календарь беременности, приложение для беременных, которое включает в себя все необходимое в этот замечательный для вас период. Настало время, когда вы определили для себя “Буду мамой!”.

Все будущие мамочки, которые хотят отслеживать срок беременности, хоть раз пробовали различные календари беременности. Вас заботит как отследить беременность, календарь по неделям вам поможет. BabyInside создан молодыми родителями для молодых родителей, поэтому мы точно знаем, что происходит с будущей мамой на каждой недели беременности, как развивается жизнь внутри беременной.

Беременная мама найдет для себя много полезного. Мы собрали необходимые статьи, функции, такие как график веса, упражнение кегеля, чек-лист для молодой мамы, советы для пап в одном удобном приложении. Отслеживать срок беременности с BabyInside очень удобно!

Вы можете быстро определить дата родов по месячным. Для того, чтобы узнать дату родов или какая у вас неделя беременности, вам потребуется только ввести дату первого дня последней менструации. Мы подскажем, какие вещи собрать в роддом, как выбрать роддом, советы по питанию, витамины для беременных, упражнения для будущих мам и многое другое. Если вы думаете, что это приложение создано только для мам - вы сильно ошибаетесь. Календарь беременности по неделям могут использовать, и молодые папы найдут для себя много интересной информации:
- токсикоз, как с ним бороться
- счетчик схваток, когда ехать в роддом
- калькулятор беременности, расчет срока по месячным
- сколько осталось дней до родов
- беременность по неделям, даты недель для удобного отслеживания
- календарь беременности
- статьи о беременности, питание для будущих мам, фитнес при беременности
- все о родах
- грудное вскармливание
- многоплодная беременности, близнецы, двойня, тройня
- и многое другое

Все эти вопросы освещены в данный момент для вас в нашем приложении для молодых родителей. Будущие мамы – мы готовы сопроводить вас в это прекрасный период вашей жизни, мы поможем вам с ним справиться. Забота о будущих мамах ляжет на нас! А готовы ли вы? Скачивайте наше приложение. Будем признательны за хорошую оценку!
Terms of Use: https://babyinsideapp.ru/terms.html",2021-06-12T07:00:00Z,2025-11-07T15:48:22Z

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,8,1522252397,Vanuatu Guideline Host,Therapeutic Guidelines Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/vanuatu-guideline-host/id1522252397?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Medical,"Vanuatu Guideline Host has been developed for health practitioners in Vanuatu to provide access to locally developed standard treatment guidelines at the point of care.
Features:
- Easy navigation through topic headings
- Search functionality across all navigable terms
- PDF view of each guideline page
- A bookmark function to quickly access frequently used topics
- A creatinine clearance calculator
- Fully accessible offline after the initial download

This app contains guidelines and other resources which have been endorsed by the Vanuatu Ministry of Health for use by registered health practitioners in Vanuatu. Permission to include these resources on the app has been provided by the Vanuatu National Drugs and Therapeutics Committee.
Disclaimer:

This app is intended to help health practitioners in Vanuatu make decisions about the care of their patients. The guidelines included in the app form an acceptable basis for the management of patients, but there may be sound clinical reasons for different therapy in individual patients. Users must exercise independent professional judgement when basing therapy on these guidelines and seek appropriate advice where necessary.
The guidelines included on this app are intended for use in Vanuatu, and may not be applicable in other settings.

The content of this app is not intended to serve as health, medical or treatment advice for individuals – please seek the advice of a qualified health practitioner for diagnosis or treatment information or when making medical decisions.
To provide feedback on the app, click on the survey link on the information page (internet access required). Feedback provided this way is anonymous.
For feedback on the guidelines contained in this app, please contact the authors listed in the relevant guidelines or the Vanuatu National Drugs and Therapeutics Committee.

Vanuatu Guideline Host was developed by Therapeutic Guidelines Ltd (TGL) in collaboration with the Ministry of Health, Government of Vanuatu with funding from the Australian Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade.",2022-08-01T07:00:00Z,2025-07-23T23:08:17Z

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,9,321367289,Medscape,WebMD Health Corporation,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/medscape/id321367289?uo=4,0.0,2,1,Medical,"Your Go-To Medical Resource for Immediate Clinical Answers

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,10,386022579,BabyCentre - Pregnancy tracker,"Everyday Health, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/babycentre-pregnancy-tracker/id386022579?uo=4,0.0,4.77778,9,Medical,"Discover the BabyCentre Pregnancy Tracker and Baby App – your perfect companion for pregnancy and parenthood!

Expecting? BabyCentre’s Pregnancy Tracker app is here to guide you every step of the way! Track your pregnancy week by week and day by day with expert pregnancy tips, foetal development videos, and content tailored to your unique pregnancy and parenting journey. Just enter your baby’s due date, and let our pregnancy app bring you personalised guidance, advice, and tools from the start of your pregnancy right through to your baby’s first birthday.
Our BabyCentre Pregnancy and Baby app offers everything you need in one place:
Track your journey with our pregnancy tracker

column3: Get daily updates on how your baby is developing, tailored to your exact stage of pregnancy.
Enjoy a daily news feed with tips on pregnancy nutrition, pregnancy exercise, and pregnancy symptom management.
Weekly pregnancy reminders, pregnancy checklists, and pregnancy insights make staying informed easy and fun!

column1: Instant expert advice for pregnancy at your fingertips

column3: Need answers to your pregnancy questions? Our team of Midwives is here to help with real-time support for any pregnancy questions that come up.
Access hundreds of expert articles on every pregnancy topic from BabyCentre, guiding you from bump to baby.

column1: Join a community of mums and new parents

column3: Connect with mums-to-be in your Birth Club, where you can share, ask, and learn about pregnancy together.
Chat with other parents about baby names, early pregnancy symptoms, baby essentials, and everything else related to pregnancy.

column1: Find the perfect baby name

column3: Looking for a baby name finder? Our Baby Name Tool helps you explore thousands of baby names and meanings for your pregnancy journey.

column1: …and so much more!

column3: Use our due date calculator to track your pregnancy, see interactive foetal development images throughout pregnancy, track your bump in our “Bumpie” pregnancy photo diary, and dive into exclusive “Inside the Uterus” pregnancy videos.

column1: From pregnancy to the first year of your baby’s life, our pregnancy app evolves with you, bringing expert pregnancy advice, a supportive community, and all the essential tools you need for a smooth pregnancy experience.
Download the BabyCentre Pregnancy and Baby App today and enjoy every step of your pregnancy journey!
All health information in our pregnancy app is approved by the BabyCentre Medical Advisory Board and certified by the NHS England Information Standard.

Let's connect! Facebook: facebook.com/BabyCentreUK Instagram: @babycentreuk Twitter: @babycentreuk Pinterest: pinterest.com/babycentre YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3gaQduurXoDOFMSNSKnJVA

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,11,505864483,Pregnancy + | Tracker App,Philips Digital UK Limited,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/pregnancy-tracker-app/id505864483?uo=4,0.0,5,3,Medical,"Download the world's leading pregnancy tracker app today, for free week-by-week pregnancy information and articles!

Baby Development

Our EXCLUSIVE 3D Models

Pregnancy Articles & Guides

If you're feeling overwhelmed by all the advice out there, don't worry. Our Pregnancy + tracker app will guide you through your pregnancy, week-by-week, keeping you up to date with your baby's development and helping you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond. Share your journey with friends & family

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,12,519076558,Blood Pressure Monitor SmartBP,"Evolve Medical Systems, LLC",https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/blood-pressure-monitor-smartbp/id519076558?uo=4,0.0,4,4,Medical,"SmartBP® is a digital blood pressure app that empowers you to record, observe, assess, and share your blood pressure reports utilising iOS devices and the Apple Watch. Moreover, SmartBP interfaces with Apple Health, providing your health data at your fingertips, and enabling you to be proactive in your own wellbeing. For those grappling with prehypertension or hypertension, SmartBP can aid in tracking progress, spotting trends, and managing all your blood pressure and heart measurements, with the ultimate goal of improving your overall cardiovascular health and blood pressure. SmartBP is a more intelligent way to handle your blood pressure readings and track your improvement.
Disclaimer:

- SmartBP permits you to log, track, and evaluate trends in your blood pressure. You can manually input your readings or use a blood pressure monitor to synchronise with SmartBP through Apple Health. SmartBP in itself does not measure blood pressure. A separate blood pressure monitor is required for this.

- SmartBP is NOT a replacement for a doctor or professional healthcare or advice. Any health-related information provided is for informational purposes only and should not be used to substitute the advice of healthcare professionals.

- SmartBP Cloud Sync is not a replacement for backing up your health data. While we strive for the highest data security, no measures can ensure 100% protection. Regular data backups are the user's responsibility.
For guidance on how to use the app, visit our website
Video: www.smartbp.app
FAQ: www.smartbp.app/faq
Features-

- Log your systolic and diastolic blood pressure, pulse rate and weight. Body mass index (BMI), pulse pressure (PP) and mean arterial pressure (MAP) are automatically calculated. Either manually enter measurements or effortlessly sync them with a supported Bluetooth BP monitor.
- Swiftly add notes (e.g. before dinner) and measurement details (e.g. sitting, left arm) utilising tags.

- Store and access all your blood pressure readings anywhere and anytime using Apple HealthKit. Sidestep manual data entry and reduce mistakes by auto-uploading blood pressure readings to HealthKit by auto-syncing with SmartBP. The following Blood Pressure Monitors can link to HealthKit (check for compatibility with different models):
A&D
Omron
Beurer
Braun
Withings

- Share your blood pressure information with your doctor, healthcare provider or family using email, text message (SMS), Apple HealthKit. Create blood pressure reports in PDF format with blood pressure data, graphs and statistics and share with your GP or healthcare provider.
- View a 7, 14, 30-day summary grouped by daily morning/afternoon averages and tags. Create, share and print summary PDF reports and CSV files.
- Print PDF reports or graphs directly

- Analyse your progress through clear graphs and statistics (including mean and variability). Filter data using tags to assess lifestyle changes or medication effectiveness. Compare tagged graphs side by side and observe systolic vs. diastolic blood pressure correlations.
- Track your Heart Rate trends
- Sync ECG records
- Back up your health data and access it on all your mobile devices with SmartBP Cloud.  This is an optional service. We do not sell your health data.
- Sync directly between iPhone and iPad through Bluetooth or WiFi without sharing on the cloud.
- Back up blood pressure data by exporting to Dropbox, and Drive, or import from CSV files into the app.
- Protect your data with TouchID, FaceID or Pin keypad protection.
- Set medication reminders & track effectiveness.

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,14,570244389,Ovia Cycle & Pregnancy Tracker,"Ovuline, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/ovia-cycle-pregnancy-tracker/id570244389?uo=4,0.0,5,6,Medical,"At Ovia Health by Labcorp, we’re here to empower women at every stage of their health journey—from your period through fertility, pregnancy, postpartum, perimenopause, menopause, and beyond. OVULATION CALCULATOR & FERTILITY TRACKER

PERIOD AND MENSTRUAL CYCLE TRACKER

PREGNANCY & POSTPARTUM

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,21,707430013,Best Menstrual Period Tracker,Anastasia Kovba,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/best-menstrual-period-tracker/id707430013?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Medical,"The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.
* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.
* Full Version *
This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:
- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.
* How to Use *
To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:
- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).
- Average length of the menstrual cycle (adjust it on the “Settings” screen).
- Length of the luteal phase (most women can use the default value).
The application works best for women with regular menstrual cycle. But average cycle length is also a good way to predict when the ovulation should happen.",2013-11-20T00:19:39Z,2021-05-10T20:49:44Z

Reminders sync to your other mobile devices when you sign-in with your WebMD account.

• Doctor Directory – Find the closest doctors and specialists based on your current location or search by city, state or zip.
• Conditions – Find medically-reviewed information about conditions relevant to you and learn more about causes, treatments, and related symptoms.
• Customization and Saving Functionality – Save your conditions, drugs, doctors, hospitals, pharmacies, and healthy living articles for secure, easy access and reference.
• Drug Interaction Checker – Find and identify potentially harmful and unsafe combinations of prescription medications by entering two or more drugs in question.

If you are a California resident, California law may provide you with certain rights regarding our use of your personal information. For more information relevant to our users who are California residents, please review the ""California Residents"" section of our Privacy Policy linked on this download page or within our app.
ABOUT WebMD

WebMD Health Corp. (Nasdaq: WBMD) is the leading provider of health information services, serving consumers, physicians, healthcare professionals, employers, and health plans through our public and private online portals, mobile platforms and health-focused publications. More than 95 million unique visitors access the WebMD Health Network each month.
The WebMD Health Network includes WebMD Health, Medscape, MedicineNet, emedicineHealth, RxList, theheart.org, drugs.com and Medscape Education.

pg,Papua New Guinea,Medical,6020,24,379871271,Anatomy Lectures and MCQs,Andrew WHITAKER,https://apps.apple.com/pg/app/anatomy-lectures-and-mcqs/id379871271?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Medical,"Learn human anatomy with this app - In this application you will find the following example lectures from our Lectures apps along with 80 sample MCQs from our Anatomy MCQ app:
• Heart and Pericardium
• Ankle Joint and Foot Movements
• Larynx and Laryngopharynx
• Posterior Forearm
• Bursae and the Popliteal Fossa
• Knee and Unhappy Triad Syndrome
• Principles of Movements at Joints in the Upper Limb
• Embryology in a Nutshell part 1

This series of lectures is aimed at anyone who is studying human anatomy. They are ideal for medical or nursing students, biological studies students and physiotherapists or doctors looking to refresh their knowledge.
The lectures will play and the relevant diagrams will appear in time with the audio.
You can zoom in on the images with the pinch gesture as the audio plays.
You will find the other anatomy applications in the App Store by searching for Instant Anatomy.

The material is presented by Dr Robert Whitaker who spent his clinical career as a paediatric urological surgeon. Having retired from surgery, Dr Whitaker now teaches clinically applied topographical anatomy to first-year medical students at the University of Cambridge, in the UK. He also teaches clinically applied anatomy to surgical, radiological and other speciality trainees and is a former examiner for the MRCS at the English and Edinburgh Colleges of Surgeons. Dr Whitaker is also the co-author of the top selling book Instant Anatomy.
See our website for more information - www.instantanatomy.net",2012-06-03T01:13:15Z,2019-10-09T12:25:32Z
